start_text:
👋 Hello! I'm a bot for finding teams and clubs in Brawl Stars.
Click «Start» to learn about all my features. 🔮
subscription_required: Subscribe to Bubser Brawl Stars channel and click start
error_checking_subscription: ❌ Error checking subscription. Please try again later.
search_team_menu_text: 📋 Choose one of the buttons for team:
search_club_menu_text: 📋 Choose one of the buttons for club:
normal_search_advice_text:
💡 Tip:
If you notice an announcement with violations, click «⚠️ Report». Thank you!
no_announcements: 📝 No announcements sent. Send a photo to create:
report_text: ⬆️ What violation is in this announcement?
premium_text:
😎 Be the best with Premium subscription and its cool features!

⭐️ Early access to new features – test new functions first.

📲 Video and GIF in announcements – attract more teammates!

🔥 Two active announcements – search for two teams or clubs simultaneously.

🏆 Premium badge – stand out among other players.

👍 No ads

😮 No need to subscribe to sponsors for coins
premium_active_text:
😎 Be the best with Premium subscription and its cool features!

⭐️ Early access to new features – test new functions first.

📲 Video and GIF in announcements – attract more teammates!

🔥 Two active announcements – search for two teams or clubs simultaneously.

🏆 Premium badge – stand out among other players.

👍 No ads

😮 No need to subscribe to sponsors for coins

✅ Your premium subscription is active until: {date}
ann_select_keyword: 🔑 Choose a keyword for your announcement:
not_your_announcement: ❌ This is not your announcement or it doesn't exist
gift_text:
🎁 Get a gift every day at 00:00!

⚠️ You need to subscribe to all sponsors or have premium status to receive gifts.
gift_time_error: ⏰ You've already received your gift today. Come back tomorrow!
gift_sponsors_required: ⚠️ You need to subscribe to all sponsors or have premium status to receive gifts.
gift_subscribe_to_sponsors: ⚠️ Subscribe to all sponsors to receive daily gifts!
sponsors_description:
Subscribe to our sponsors to receive daily gifts! 🎁
Premium users can receive gifts without subscription!
sponsors_premium_description:
🌟 You have premium status!
No need to subscribe to sponsors for gifts.
no_sponsors: 🤷‍♂️ No sponsors available at the moment.
check_subscription_text:
📲 To be able to receive daily gifts, subscribe to the sponsor channel: {name}

After subscribing, click «Confirm Subscription».
subscription_error: ❌ Error checking subscription. Please try again later.
sponsor_not_subscribed: ❌ You are not subscribed to the sponsor channel. Please subscribe and try again.
